mapper.sql: storeId, commissionType, commissionName, commissionWay, commissionAmount, beginDate, endDate, beginTime, endTime, week, isDelete, creator, updater, ctime, utime
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_commission_rule
storeId,
commissionType,
commissionName,
commissionWay,
commissionAmount,
beginDate,
endDate,
beginTime,
endTime,
week,
isDelete,
creator,
updater,
ctime,
utime,
#{storeId},
#{commissionType},
#{commissionName},
#{commissionWay},
#{commissionAmount},
#{beginDate},
#{endDate},
#{beginTime},
#{endTime},
#{week},
#{isDelete},

mapper.update:
UPDATE t_commission_rule
storeId = #{storeId},
commissionType = #{commissionType},
commissionName = #{commissionName},
commissionWay = #{commissionWay},
commissionAmount = #{commissionAmount},
beginDate = #{beginDate},
endDate = #{endDate},
beginTime = #{beginTime},
endTime = #{endTime},
week = #{week},
isDelete = #{isDelete},
creator = #{creator},
updater = #{updater},
ctime = #{ctime},
utime = #{utime}
WHERE id = #{id}
